abstract: Rio Tinto is interested in possible bolt-on acquisitions in a range of sectors, including potash, an executive said on Thursday, Reuters reported.
snippet: Rio Tinto is interested in possible bolt-on acquisitions in a range of sectors, including potash, an executive said on Thursday, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The mining company Rio Tinto is interested in possible bolt-on acquisitions in a range of sectors, including potash, an executive said on Thursday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Is Said to Be Interested in Potash Sector
